      • shootAt

        public boolean shootAt(int row,
                       int column)
        Description copied from class: Ship
        If a part of the ship occupies the given row and column, and the ship hasn’t been sunk, mark that part of the ship as “hit” (in the hit array, index 0 indicates the bow) and return true; otherwise return false
        Overrides:
        shootAt in class Ship
        Returns:
        True if it is legal, False otherwise.

      • isSunk

        public boolean isSunk()
        Description copied from class: Ship
        Check if the ship has been sunk.
        Overrides:
        isSunk in class Ship
        Returns:
        true if every part of the ship has been hit, false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Description copied from class: Ship
        Returns a single-character String to use in the Ocean's print method. This method should return "x" if the ship has been sunk, "S" if it has not been sunk. This method can be used to print out locations in the ocean that have been shot at; it should not be used to print locations that have not been shot at.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Ship
